Text: He added that the priority sector norms will be reviewed by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) which will lead to additional lending of Rs 30,000 crore to exporters in the coming days.
Cause: He added that the priority sector norms will be reviewed by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI)
Effect: additional lending of Rs 30,000 crore to exporters in the coming days.
Sentence: <e1>He added that the priority sector norms will be reviewed by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI)</e1> which will lead to <e2>additional lending of Rs 30,000 crore to exporters in the coming days.</e2>
